item.title: The votes are in
item.description:
We took the Open Space voting from DevopsDays Paris and asked the meetup groups in Leeds and Manchester what they wanted to hear about ?
So here are the results:
 Topic  Paris  Leeds  Manchester  Monitoring as Code  30  5  11   Docker 101  15  5  5   How to explain to management why devops is awesome  11  1  4   Why? Ansible or Chef or Puppet (selection)  16  10  4   Code Review  20  3  0   Leaders expected attitude in a devops journey  16  0  0   How to make test automation reliable, reusable, robust and costless   9  4  2   Microservices a support nightmare ?
